body_html:
It can vary, but they mostly use random sampling, linear algebra methods, autograd (mostly through linalg methods rather than through NN layers), and sometimes gradient-based optimizers.

body:
It can vary, but they mostly use random sampling, linear algebra methods,
autograd (mostly through linalg methods rather than through NN layers), and
sometimes gradient-based optimizers.


On Thu, Mar 8, 2018 at 12:21 gchanan <notifications@github.com> wrote:
